name: Earthshatter Girdle
tooltip:
Earthshatter GirdleLevel 60

Rimblat Earthshatter at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make an Earthshatter Girdle if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Girdle, 8 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 3 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Girdle
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 8
- Arcanite Bar
- Nexus Crystal x 3
